hero.sub_title: analysis of the team and candidates in terms of the compatibility of psychological profiles

background.title: Prerequisites
problems_list: The manager forms the team without considering the psychological characteristics of the team members. This often leads to intra-team conflicts, reduced productivity, efficiency and the risk of employee leaving.

Lack of people with the necessary soft skills to effectively solve the necessary tasks, taking into account the specialization of the team, for example, sales, development (employees with different types of character, psychological portraits are required)
It is difficult to choose the right candidate for the team. It is necessary to consider not only the technical skills, but also the psychological characteristics of the candidate.
solutions_list: We give an understandable tool for solving these problems - TEAM CONSTRUCTOR
Each user must pass a small test and then we take over all calculations of intra-team interaction.

consist.title: What the service includes
consist.test_desc: After passing our test, the user receives a detailed detailed description of his psychological portrait
consist.team_desc: Having the test results of different people, you can predict the interaction between them, in particular
test_list: Consists of 75 questions, the completion takes an average of 15 minutes

Scientific basis: developments by L.N.Sobchik (Theory of leading trends); R. Ackoff, F. Emery. (On purposeful systems.), W. Schutz (Theory of interpersonal relations), as well as studies of congenital and acquired features of the brain.
Maintains high accuracy, while being convenient for fast passage
Cross-cultural, understandable for all ages in any environment in any language
The result is processed and encoded, it is convenient for saving and transferring between services
team_list: Determine the informal leader in the team
Understand the level of mutual understanding and effectiveness of team interaction
Determine those with whom or without whom the team will interact more effectively
To understand how well this or that candidate will fit into the team in terms of the microclimate of the team
Create teams to solve specific problems (sales, service, quality control, etc.)

roles.title: Heads of departments
roles.desc: to form teams of suitable people or for the necessary tasks, taking into account specialization (sales, analytics, creativity, quality assurance, etc.)

roles.title: Human Resource Professionals
roles.desc: find out the psychological profile of the candidate and his potential compatibility with the existing team

steps.title: Register now
steps.text: Create a new account or log in if you already have an account.

steps.title: Pass express test
steps.text: Find 10-15 minutes of free time, retire and answer the questions of the psychological test without hesitation

steps.title: Send link to employees
steps.text: Employees from whom you are going to form teams must pass the test and give you the results

steps.title: Create project
steps.text: Using the teamconstructor service create your first project

steps.title: Create a pool of workers
steps.text: If your employees are registered in the service, then you can easily find their data. If not, you can enter them manually.

steps.title: Form teams
steps.text: By dragging and dropping your employees' cards from the pool, form several team guards and choose the most effective one.
